message.body: Yo its daneka :] hope ur weekend is good. when were u gonna be in ceramics today? i wanna c if i can load my project and anna's butterfly vase

Im actly just finishing lunch...super late lunch and then i need to go to clairmont to get my stuff and take the shuttle to school.so ill prob be there around5? will u still be there? i can also just load the kiln by myself if ur busy :]
nah, that sounds good. see you then!
oh man. the problem is that the kiln's at 1733 right now. but on a positive note, your purple thing is definitely purple.
Ahaha cool! to the 2nd thing...okay, do u think it will be cool later tonight? like cld i just load it at 10 or smthn? or monday i guess?
i think it'll have to be monday.
Okay no worries. Im free monday after 5...
same. i get out of photography at 4:30 so i'll already be here.
Cool. Could i at least load annas proj into a kiln?/fire? her vase on her shelf.
well, there's literally nothing else on the shelf, so...

So ya? or so no? bc if u dont fire again till friday it wont rly matter to use a kiln for one project right? but i also dnt think its a big deal so waiting till tmrw should be chill for both things :] cool. thanks4 the update
So ya just ignore me ha
haha, no probs, see you tomorrow!
Yo how many peeps was i sposed to takeout?
just the top one. what's the temp?
Thot so. I did it when it was 1888 now its 1487
